column3: “very nice strain! found it to be highly cerebrel and a real heavy kind of high”

“My wife and I picked up A bag form Colorado harvest company. Both of us are every day users.so, we were expecting a average high.  But we were Completely blown away by this stuff! An overwhelming sense of well-being and calm. With a great body high.

  I would advise not to use a-lot late at night. It will not put you to sleep. Or at least it didn’t for me.”

“Hard to rate this strain. Not sure who to blame but the buds litterly dissolved when picked up. It was so dry. I did really like this strain effect wise. Nice relaxing, back pain was minimal and stress is gone. Only problem it took two one gram joints. I do have a fairly high tolerance. If the potency was up and the obvious dryness wasn’t there it would be a pretty decent indica. Taste was as drescibed by Leafly.

Ap...”
